pr_title: Rewrite code for binary size collection.

timeline.message:
Rewrite code for binary size collection.

- Move apk generation code into a separate gradle project.
- Move metrics uploading code into fireci.
- A failure from a SDK does not affect metrics collection for other SDKs.
- Misc. cleanup.

+
